message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $9,000.  How about we split the difference and meet at $9,500? This price still gives you a good deal, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $9,000. Can you meet me at $9,250?
